Description: List of Virtual machines with unencrypted disks and/or volumes.
Remediation: Navigate to  the identified virtual machines individually → select "Disks" → select "Encryption" → select the disk(s) to encrypt → select or configure an Azure Key Vault to manage the disks encryption keys. -NotifyOnAlert
